tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was a wonderful experience visiting his centre. Could schedule the appointments easily. Delivery and putting of attachments were quick. Overall great experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Smiling face, supporting & detail process explaining regarding our issues as well as cons & pros, hygiene, value, quality material use. Overall five star.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
** ***** ******  ** *** **** **** ** ***** ** *********Being in my 40's I was wondering if my teeth would  ever move in .. In my first appointment  itself Dr Shetty's  friendly nature  made me feel so comfortable about the treatment as all my doubts were cleared ..  The best part was he made the payments in installment and never ever reminded about the payment  if ever I skipped an installment.  
I'm glad my treatment was done by him and now my smile has made me more confident...to stand may be in front of a crowd or cam..
Thank you Dr Shetty. Stay Blessed Always..
Regards
Belinda Pereira.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Yoban Shetty is the best person to get your braces from. I got my teeth aligned through braces from him. My treatment took a total of 3 years. During the entire time he has been really friendly and treated my teeth extremely well. I was very lazy with wearing my rubbers, but he made sure my teeth weren’t affected due to the same. Also to keep my teeth in place after the removal of my braces, he made sure they were splinted well and took care of them time and again. I am extremely happy with how they look right now, and I’m ever grateful for my smile. I really really recommend him!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Amazing experience with both the Doctors , solutions to the problems, every issue was discussed and answered in length. 

I was loaded with questuons when I went inside being first time. Came out with all the suggestions and care.

I was referred with Dr Satyapal Shetty from Bhandup

Thanks
Cheers!!!!!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctors over here are quite friendly. The appointments are scheduled according to the patients convience. Also, the guidance given by the doctor before the treatment starts is really helpful. The staff is good too. The centre is clean and hygienic. Also, during covid 19 pandemic all the required precautions were followed very strictly which was really impressing. I would recommend KKMDC to all those who require dental care treatment.
